channel.title: [317] How do i make a teleport teleport you [317]
channel.description:
Source: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,422756.msg3103321.html#msg3103321]UniversalScape[/url] Deob: 317
I want to be able to make a teleport so say it's the pking teleport okay so. when i press the portal it comes up with options saying like. "Edgeville pking, Wildness Pking, Varrock Pking". How do i get a portal to do that, so when i click one of them it'll teleport me to a place. [hr]
How do i add a portal to teleport you.

item.title: [317] How do i make a teleport teleport you [317]
item.dc:creator: @Opium10 Opium10
item.description:
@Opium10 wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:6, topic:349316”][quote author=Opium10 link=topic=445690.msg3271768#msg3271768 date=1279252179]

I don’t know what UniveralScape looks like so I’m guessing it’s packaged and guessing you have to go to ObjectOption1 packet to handle what you want the object to do.

Same with action buttons, you go to its packet and make it do what you want it to do.

And your client.jerba should have a makeGlobalObject or createObject method.

You mean objecthandler?
[/quote]

No. Do you know what packets are in a server?[/quote]
I’ve switched to this server, i think it’s a dodian

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Read full topic

item.title: [317] How do i make a teleport teleport you [317]
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“Opium10, post:5, topic:349316”][quote author=LilXCj link=topic=445690.msg3271763#msg3271763 date=1279252037]
I don’t know what UniveralScape looks like so I’m guessing it’s packaged and guessing you have to go to ObjectOption1 packet to handle what you want the object to do.

Same with action buttons, you go to its packet and make it do what you want it to do.

And your client.jerba should have a makeGlobalObject or createObject method.
[/quote]
You mean objecthandler?[/quote]

No. Do you know what packets are in a server?
